pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:11.2: padena vāceti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:12.2: lekhaṃ vāceti, dhāraṇaṃ vāceti, guttatthāya parittaṃ vāceti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
